name: SPEC_NEOADJUVANT_TRT_TYPE
description: This table stores the type of neoadjuvant treatment used.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NEOADJUVANT_TREAT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the type of neoadjuvant treatment used for this patient.
